data.title: IN PICS: TV couple Hiten Tejwani-Gauri Pradhan's LIP-LOCK on their 14th WEDDING ANNIVERSARY will make you fall in love!
data.meta_description: IN PICS: TV couple Hiten Tejwani-Gauri Pradhan's LIP-LOCK on their 14th WEDDING ANNIVERSARY will make you fall in love!
data.text:
Popular TV actor Hiten Tejwani last seen in Bigg Boss 11 and his actress wife Gauri Pradhan are one of the most gorgeous small screen couples who have always given their fans a major relationship goals! The duo celebrated their 14th marriage anniversary recently and to mark the special occasion, the happily married couple steal a kiss that is leaving us gushing over the two. Hiten and Gairi are simply beaming with joy and they called in for a small celebration last night. Hiten-Gauri got married in 2007 Amidst friends, the two were seen head over heels in love with each other. The doting husband Hiten took to social media in sharing an adorable picture of the two locking lips. Bigg Boss 11's Hiten Tejwani is in a SNOW-LAND with wife Gauri and their ROMANTIC PICS will make you go green with envy! He captioned it as, "Happy anniversary my world @gpradhan ..thank you for everything #GHTTogetherForever#14yearsandcounting #LifeofHT#hitentejwaniofficial #life #family." Gauri too re-posted the pic wishing her hubby and also shared one more pic from the celebration: Hiten and Gauri were co-stars in the decade old show Kkutumb and that's where there love story began. The two got married in 2007 and a blessed with a set of twin boy Nevan and daughter Kataya. Hiten-Gauri with their twin son & daughter Nevan and Kaatya During Hiten's Bigg Boss 11 tenure, Gauri was seen supporting him throughout, in-fact during the family task the duo broke down to tears on seeing each-other after so long proving their eternal love for each other. Recently during Hiten's birthday too, the duo shared a lip-lock pic: A pic from Hiten's birthday bash Hiten Tejwani ROMANCING wife Gauri in their FIRST advertisement will make you fall in love and is going VIRAL! When Hiten-Gauri met inside the Bigg Boss house Here's wishing the awwdorable couple a happy anniversary on completing 11 years of marital bliss. Here's some more pics of the lovely couple:
